attributes.action: Recognise that coastguard operations personnel are an emergency service provider and should be officially recognised as key workers and afforded the same assistance as other key workers under government legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the cost of purchasing properties continuing to spiral, Key workers recieve assistance from the government. Coastguard operations personnel are not included in the list of key workers, even though as an emergency service, they assist in many thousands of incidents each year. This needs to be urgently addressed and brought into line with other key workers.
